**Purpose of the Activity**
This activity involves running an experiment and analysing the collected data using a Shiny app. The purpose is to enhance your understanding of experimental design, data collection, and analysis as part of your classwork.

**Voluntary Participation**
Participation in this activity is voluntary. You may choose not to participate, and this will not affect your grade or standing in the course.

**Data Collection and Privacy**
The data collected during this experiment will be anonymised and used solely for educational purposes. No personally identifiable information will be recorded or shared.

**Consent**
By agreeing, you acknowledge that:

- You understand the purpose of this activity and what is involved.
- You consent to the collection and use of data for the purposes outlined above.
- You are free to withdraw from the activity at any time without penalty.
